trans-unit.source: Contains functionality common to row header cells and column header cells.
trans-unit.target: Contém funcionalidade comuns células de cabeçalho de linha e células de cabeçalho de coluna.

trans-unit.source: This class is a base class for other header cell classes, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe é uma classe base para outras classes de célula de cabeçalho, como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>

trans-unit.source: To create custom row header icons or column header glyphs, inherit from the DataGridViewHeaderCell class and add functionality to paint your own icon or glyph.
trans-unit.target: Para criar os ícones de cabeçalho de linha personalizadas ou glyphs de cabeçalho de coluna, herdar da classe de DataGridViewHeaderCell e adicionar funcionalidades à sua própria ícone ou glifo de pintura.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the buttonlike visual state of the header cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado visual buttonlike da célula de cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell> is like a button in that it can be clicked to set states, such as sorting or performing row-level selection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>é como um botão que podem ser clicado para definir os Estados, como a ordenação ou efetuar a seleção de ao nível da linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>

trans-unit.source: The ButtonState property uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState?displayProperty=fullName> values to provide buttonlike visual states.
trans-unit.target: As utilizações de propriedade ButtonState <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState?displayProperty=fullName>valores a fornecer buttonlike Estados visual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState"></xref> values; the default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState"> </xref> valores; a predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this cell.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia exata esta célula.

trans-unit.source: Override the Clone method whenever you derive from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell> and add new properties to the derived class.
trans-unit.target: Substitua o método de Clone sempre que derivar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>e adicione novas propriedades à classe derivada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa o clonado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the cell is currently displayed on-screen.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a célula é atualmente apresentada no ecrã.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell is on-screen or partially on-screen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a célula está no ecrã ou parcialmente no ecrã; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"> </xref> e opcionalmente liberta os recursos geridos.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the formatted value of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo do valor formatado da célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property is the actual data object contained by the cell, whereas the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> property is the formatted representation of the data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>propriedade é o objeto de dados real contido célula, enquanto o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>propriedade é a representação com formatação dos dados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ValueType%2A> and FormattedValueType properties correspond to the data types of these values, respectively.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ValueType%2A>e FormattedValueType propriedades correspondem aos tipos de dados destes valores, respetivamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> object representing the <xref:System.String> type.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>objeto que representa o <xref:System.String>tipo.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the cell is frozen.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a célula está fixa.

trans-unit.source: The Frozen property is `true` if the cell belongs to a frozen row or column, or if the cell is the top-left header cell.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Frozen é `true` se a célula pertence a uma linha fixa ou uma coluna ou se a célula está a célula do cabeçalho superior esquerdo.

trans-unit.source: A cell, row, or column is frozen when its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A> property has a value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates?displayProperty=fullName>
trans-unit.target: Uma célula, linha ou coluna está fixa quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A>propriedade tem um valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell is frozen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a célula está fixa; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the cell is detached from a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se a célula se desliga de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the shortcut menu of the header cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o menu de atalho de célula de cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell> does not have a shortcut menu, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell> will inherit the shortcut menu from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>não tiver um menu de atalho, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>irá herdar o menu de atalho do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> also does not have a shortcut menu, then the GetInheritedContextMenuStrip method will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>também não tem um menu de atalho, em seguida, irá devolver o método GetInheritedContextMenuStrip `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Ignored by this implementation.
trans-unit.target: Ignorado por esta implementação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> has a shortcut menu assigned; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref> se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> tem um menu de atalho atribuído; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating the current state of the cell as inherited from the state of its row or column.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica o estado atual da célula como herdado do Estado da respetiva linha ou coluna.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the cell or -1 if the cell is not a row header cell or is not contained within a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha que contém a célula ou -1 se a célula não for uma célula de cabeçalho de linha ou não está contida dentro de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values representing the current state of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> valores que representa o estado atual da célula.

trans-unit.source: The cell is a column header cell or the control's and rowIndex is not -1.
trans-unit.target: A célula for uma célula de cabeçalho de coluna ou o controlo e rowIndex não for -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho da célula.

trans-unit.source: The GetSize method returns the size necessary to fit in a row of column headers if the header cell is a column header, the size necessary to fit in a column of row headers if the header cell is a row header, or the size necessary to be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell> if the cell is a top left header cell.
trans-unit.target: O método GetSize devolve o tamanho necessário para caber numa linha de cabeçalhos de coluna se a célula do cabeçalho é um cabeçalho de coluna, o tamanho necessário para caber numa coluna dos cabeçalhos de linha se a célula do cabeçalho é um cabeçalho de linha ou o tamanho necessário ser um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell>se a célula for uma célula do cabeçalho superior esquerdo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell>

trans-unit.source: If the cell is not attached to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Size%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell> returns the value (-1,-1).
trans-unit.target: Se a célula não está ligada a um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Size%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>devolve o valor (-1, -1).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Size%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The row index of the header cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha da célula de cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the size of the header cell.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa o tamanho da célula de cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: The value of the property for this cell is and rowIndex does not equal -1. -or- The value of the property for this cell is not and rowIndex does not equal -1.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <> *> propriedade esta célula é e rowIndex não é igual a -1. - ou - o valor da <> *> propriedade esta célula não é e rowIndex não é igual a -1.

trans-unit.source: -or- The value of the property for this cell is not and rowIndex is less than zero or greater than or equal to the number of rows in the control. -or- The values of the and properties of this cell are both and rowIndex does not equal -1.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o valor da <> *> propriedade esta célula não é e rowIndex é menor que zero ou maior que ou igual ao número de linhas no controlo. - ou - os valores de <> *> e Propriedades desta célula são ambos e rowIndex não é igual a -1.

trans-unit.source: The value of the property for this cell is not and rowIndex indicates a row other than the .
trans-unit.target: O valor da <> *> propriedade esta célula não é e rowIndex indica que uma linha a <> *>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor da célula.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha de principal da célula.

trans-unit.source: The value of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is not -1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndexNão é de -1.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a row will be unshared when the mouse button is held down while the pointer is on a cell in the row.
trans-unit.target: Indica se uma linha estará sem quando o botão do rato é mantido enquanto o ponteiro for de uma célula na linha.

trans-unit.source: For information about enabling visual styles, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como ativar estilos visuais, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: MouseDownUnsharesRow is called just before <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseDown%2A>.
trans-unit.target: MouseDownUnsharesRow denomina-se imediatamente antes da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseDown%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseDown%2A> has the effect of unsharing the row `rowIndex`.
trans-unit.target: Tem de devolver `true` se a chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseDown%2A>tem o efeito de unsharing a linha `rowIndex`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: It should return `false` otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Deverá devolver `false` caso contrário.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a partilha de linha, consulte [melhores práticas para o dimensionamento do controlo Windows Forms para DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the mouse position.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"> </xref> que contém informações sobre a posição do rato.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user clicks with the left mouse button, visual styles are enabled, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o utilizador clica com o botão esquerdo do rato, os estilos visuais estiverem ativados e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a row will be unshared when the mouse pointer moves over a cell in the row.
trans-unit.target: Indica se uma linha estará sem quando o ponteiro do rato se move sobre uma célula na linha.

trans-unit.source: For information about enabling visual styles, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como ativar estilos visuais, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: MouseEnterUnsharesRow is called just before <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseEnter%2A>.
trans-unit.target: MouseEnterUnsharesRow é chamado imediatamente antes da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseEnter%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseEnter%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseEnter%2A> has the effect of unsharing the row `rowIndex`.
trans-unit.target: Tem de devolver `true` se a chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseEnter%2A>tem o efeito de unsharing a linha `rowIndex`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseEnter%2A>

trans-unit.source: It should return `false` otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Deverá devolver `false` caso contrário.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a partilha de linha, consulte [melhores práticas para o dimensionamento do controlo Windows Forms para DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The index of the row that the mouse pointer entered.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha que introduziu o ponteiro do rato.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if visual styles are enabled, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>se estilos visuais estiverem ativados e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a row will be unshared when the mouse pointer leaves the row.
trans-unit.target: Indica se uma linha estará sem quando o ponteiro do rato deixa a linha.

trans-unit.source: For information about enabling visual styles, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como ativar estilos visuais, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: MouseLeaveUnsharesRow is called just before <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseLeave%2A>.
trans-unit.target: MouseLeaveUnsharesRow é chamado imediatamente antes da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseLeave%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseLeave%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseLeave%2A> has the effect of unsharing the row `rowIndex`.
trans-unit.target: Tem de devolver `true` se a chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseLeave%2A>tem o efeito de unsharing a linha `rowIndex`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseLeave%2A>

trans-unit.source: It should return `false` otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Deverá devolver `false` caso contrário.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a partilha de linha, consulte [melhores práticas para o dimensionamento do controlo Windows Forms para DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The index of the row that the mouse pointer left.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha que o ponteiro do rato à esquerda.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ButtonState*> property value is not <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState"></xref>, visual styles are enabled, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ButtonState*>valor da propriedade não é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState"> </xref>, estilos visuais estiverem ativados e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ButtonState*>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a row will be unshared when the mouse button is released while the pointer is on a cell in the row.
trans-unit.target: Indica se uma linha estará sem quando o botão do rato é libertado enquanto o ponteiro for de uma célula na linha.

trans-unit.source: For information about enabling visual styles, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como ativar estilos visuais, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: MouseUpUnsharesRow is called just before <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseUp%2A>.
trans-unit.target: MouseUpUnsharesRow é chamado imediatamente antes da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseUp%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseUp%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseUp%2A> has the effect of unsharing the row `rowIndex`.
trans-unit.target: Tem de devolver `true` se a chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseUp%2A>tem o efeito de unsharing a linha `rowIndex`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseUp%2A>

trans-unit.source: It should return `false` otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Deverá devolver `false` caso contrário.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a partilha de linha, consulte [melhores práticas para o dimensionamento do controlo Windows Forms para DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the mouse position.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"> </xref> que contém informações sobre a posição do rato.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the left mouse button was released, visual styles are enabled, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o botão do rato esquerdo foi lançado, estilos visuais estiverem ativados e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when the mouse button is held down while the pointer is on a cell.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando o botão do rato é mantido enquanto o ponteiro for de uma célula.

trans-unit.source: The OnMouseDown method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ButtonState%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState> if the cell is clicked with the left mouse button and visual styles are enabled for headers.
trans-unit.target: Os conjuntos de método OnMouseDown o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ButtonState%2A>para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState>se a célula é clicada com o botão esquerdo do rato e estilos visuais estiverem ativados para os cabeçalhos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ButtonState%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about visual styles for headers, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações sobre os estilos visuais para cabeçalhos, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnCellMouseDown%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é semelhante a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnCellMouseDown%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnCellMouseDown%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It is called in the same circumstances in which a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseDown?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised, but it does not actually raise the event.
trans-unit.target: Denomina-se nas mesmas circunstâncias em que um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseDown?displayProperty=fullName>o evento é gerado, mas não gere, na verdade, o evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseDown?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the mouse position.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"> </xref> que contém informações sobre a posição do rato.

trans-unit.source: Called when the mouse pointer enters the cell.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando o ponteiro do rato entra na célula.

trans-unit.source: The OnMouseEnter method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ButtonState%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState> if the left mouse button is pressed when the pointer enters the cell and visual styles are enabled for headers.
trans-unit.target: Os conjuntos de método OnMouseEnter o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ButtonState%2A>para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState>se o botão esquerdo do rato é premido quando o ponteiro entra na célula e estilos visuais estiverem ativados para os cabeçalhos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ButtonState%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about visual styles for headers, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações sobre os estilos visuais para cabeçalhos, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnCellMouseEnter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é semelhante a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnCellMouseEnter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnCellMouseEnter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It is called in the same circumstances in which a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised, but it does not actually raise the event.
trans-unit.target: Denomina-se nas mesmas circunstâncias em que um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName>o evento é gerado, mas não gere, na verdade, o evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha que contém a célula.

trans-unit.source: Called when the mouse pointer leaves the cell.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando o ponteiro do rato deixa a célula.

trans-unit.source: The OnMouseLeave method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ButtonState%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState> if it was in another state and visual styles are enabled for headers.
trans-unit.target: Os conjuntos de método OnMouseLeave o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ButtonState%2A>para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState>se se encontrar num Estado outro e estilos visuais estiverem ativados para os cabeçalhos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ButtonState%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about visual styles for headers, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações sobre os estilos visuais para cabeçalhos, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnCellMouseLeave%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é semelhante a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnCellMouseLeave%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnCellMouseLeave%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It is called in the same circumstances in which a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised, but it does not actually raise the event.
trans-unit.target: Denomina-se nas mesmas circunstâncias em que um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName>o evento é gerado, mas não gere, na verdade, o evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha que contém a célula.

trans-unit.source: Called when the mouse button is released while the pointer is over the cell.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando o botão do rato é libertado enquanto o ponteiro é efetuada através de célula.

trans-unit.source: The OnMouseUp method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ButtonState%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState> if the left mouse button was released and visual styles are enabled for headers.
trans-unit.target: Os conjuntos de método OnMouseUp o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ButtonState%2A>para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState>se o botão do rato esquerdo foi libertado e estilos visuais estiverem ativados para os cabeçalhos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ButtonState%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about visual styles for headers, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações sobre os estilos visuais para cabeçalhos, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnCellMouseUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é semelhante a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnCellMouseUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnCellMouseUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It is called in the same circumstances in which a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseUp?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised, but it does not actually raise the event.
trans-unit.target: Denomina-se nas mesmas circunstâncias em que um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseUp?displayProperty=fullName>o evento é gerado, mas não gere, na verdade, o evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseUp?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the mouse position.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"> </xref> que contém informações sobre a posição do rato.

trans-unit.source: Paints the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Desenha atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> utilizado para a célula de pintura.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa a área do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> que tem de ser repainted.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that contains the bounds of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que contém os limites da célula que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha da célula que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values that specifies the state of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> valores que especifica o estado da célula.

trans-unit.source: The data of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Os dados da célula que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The formatted data of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Os dados formatados da célula que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: An error message that is associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: Uma mensagem de erro que está associada a célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that contains formatting and style information about the cell.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> que contém informações de formatação e estilo sobre a célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that contains border styles for the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> que contém os estilos do limite para a célula que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"></xref> values that specifies which parts of the cell need to be painted.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"> </xref> valores que especifica que as partes da célula tem de ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the header cell is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a célula de cabeçalho é só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: An operation tries to set this property.
trans-unit.target: Uma operação tenta definir esta propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the cell is resizable.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a célula é redimensionável.

trans-unit.source: A row header cell is resizable if the row is resizable or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode>.
trans-unit.target: Uma célula de cabeçalho de linha é redimensionável se a linha é redimensionável ou a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: A column header cell is resizable if the column is resizable or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode>.
trans-unit.target: Uma célula de cabeçalho de coluna é redimensionável se a coluna é redimensionável ou a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this cell can be resized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se esta célula pode ser redimensionada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the cell is not attached to a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se a célula não está ligada a um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cell is selected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a célula está selecionada.

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for header cells.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não é significativa para as células de cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: This property is being set.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade está a ser definida.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that describes the current object.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma cadeia que descreve o objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que representa o objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the value stored in the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo do valor armazenado na célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> object representing the <xref:System.String> type.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>objeto que representa o <xref:System.String>tipo.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether or not the cell is visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se é ou não a célula está visível.

trans-unit.source: If the cell is a row header cell, then it is visible if its row is visible and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se a célula for uma célula de cabeçalho de linha, em seguida, está visível se a linha está visível e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A>propriedade é `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the cell is a column header cell, then it is visible if its column is visible and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se a célula for uma célula de cabeçalho de coluna, em seguida, está visível se a coluna está visível e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A>propriedade é `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the cell is the top left header cell, it is visible if both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A> are true.
trans-unit.target: Se a célula a célula do cabeçalho superior esquerdo, está visível se ambos os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A>forem verdadeiros.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a célula está visível; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the cell is detached from a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se a célula se desliga de um<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>
